entry.content:
A blog web application

  • This is a flask blog I made coding along with Corey Schafer's youtube series.

  • Made a simple looking UI with Bootstrap, HTML/CSS at frontend and Flask at backend.

  • Made the website dynamic with Jinja template.

  • Integrated SQLite database for every data coming in and going out of the website. Also served data from the database to be shown on the website.

  • Integrated user registration, login system and user authentication system.

  • Integrated SMTP gmail sending system.

  • Deployed live on Heroku.

Link to Github Repository
